rules_text:
Flash
When Nixie's Edict enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures.
{2}{W}, Sacrifice Nixie's Edict: Put up to one target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
notes:
CWNRW 

A voice, unnaturally clear, rang from the sea: “You are forgiven, but not forgotten.”
